title: Apple Scales Back AI Health Coach Plans
desc: Apple is scaling back plans for an AI-based health coach, which underscores the difficulty of turning health tracking into a paid service.

title: Jhon Duran: Ex-Aston Villa striker set for sixth club aged just 22
desc: Former Aston Villa striker Jhon Duran is set to join the sixth club of his career at the age of just 22.

title: Supermarket giant Morrisons explores £1bn property deal
desc: The UK's fifth-biggest grocery chain has hired real estate advisors from CBRE to assess options for releasing up to £1bn of value from its large freehold store portfolio, Sky News learns.

title: 31 killed in blast at mosque in Pakistan capital, official says
desc: Dozens of people have also been injured after an explosion in Islamabad during Friday prayers.

title: Triple negative breast cancer cells use new strategy to boost metastatic ability
desc: Researchers at Baylor College of Medicine have uncovered a strategy that triple negative breast cancer (TNBC) cells use to boost their ability to metastasize, or spread to other organs.

title: Barcelona reach 'agreement' over Marcus Rashford Man United transfer amid Hansi Flick 'claim'
desc: Marcus Rashford has scored 10 goals for Barcelona since joining from Man United during the summer transfer window and is keen to remain at the Camp Nou next season

title: Private 'abandoned' island off coast of Gwynedd on sale for price of a semi
